cwe.@Name: DEPRECATED: Failure to Protect Stored Data from Modification
cwe.Description: This entry has been deprecated because it incorporated and confused multiple weaknesses. The issues formerly covered in this entry can be found at CWE-766 and CWE-767.

xhtml:p: Use for Mapping: Prohibited (this CWE ID must not be used to map to real-world vulnerabilities).
Rationale: This CWE has been deprecated.
Comments: see description for suggestions of other CWEs to consider.

Modification.Modification_Comment: deprecated this entry in favor of new entries which focus on the multiple weaknesses formerly described here, CWE-766 and CWE-767
